briefdescription.para: Symbol specifying maximum number of available events triggered.
Function for triggering the specified BELLBOARD task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be triggered.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified BELLBOARD task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified task register.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the specified BELLBOARD TRIGGERED event.

parameterdescription.para: Event index.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the specified BELLBOARD TRIGGER task.

parameterdescription.para: Task index.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the specified BELLBOARD event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of the BELLBOARD event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified BELLBOARD event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be enabled.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_bellboard_int_mask_t values for bit masking.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be disabled.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_bellboard_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be checked.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_bellboard_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of pending interrupts.

detaileddescription.para: States of pending interrupt are saved as a bitmask. One set at particular position means that interrupt for event is pending.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be retrieved.

simplesect.para: Bitmask with information about pending interrupts. Use nrf_bellboard_int_mask_t values for bit masking.
